game.name: PAYDAY 2: Gunslinger Weapon Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on Phone, Remote Play on Tablet, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 새로운 무기를 사용할 수 있습니다. 이번에는 거친 서부에서 온 세 가지 고전적인 총으로, 소총, 산탄총, 리볼버와 9가지 개조 모드가 포함되어 있습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: New weapons are available, this time it’s three classic guns from the wild west, including a rifle, a shotgun and a revolver, as well as 9 mods.
